```{r}
options(stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
library(httr)
library(jsonlite)
library(DT)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```


```{r}
url <- "https://api.nytimes.com/svc/mostpopular/v2/shared/1/facebook.json?api-key=yourkey"

```

```{r}
facebook_article <- GET(url, query = list("api-key" = " jH6oxeLAdOgD6ZseUbBxAKNG5WA6QgZQ "))
content <- content(facebook_article, "text")
```

```{r}
facebook_article <- fromJSON(content)
results <- as.data.frame(facebook_article$results)
```


```{r}
nrow(results)
```


```{r}
results$section
```


```{r}
results$subsection
```

```{r}
results$title
```


```{r kable, results = "asis"}
results %>%
  kable(format = "html", col.names = colnames(results)) %>%
  kable_styling() %>%
  kableExtra::scroll_box(width = "120%", height = "500px")
```
